entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
